title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 322 - Pledge Of Assets And Maintenance Of Assets By Licensed Foreign Banking Corporations In New York
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 322 - Pledge Of Assets And Maintenance Of Assets By Licensed Foreign Banking Corporations In New York

State Regulations
§ 322.1 - Deposit of assets; amount of assets to be deposited
§ 322.2 - Assets that may be deposited; conditions and limitations
§ 322.3 - Eligible assets
§ 322.4 - Liabilities requiring cover
§ 322.5 - Record of assets and liabilities
§ 322.6 - Definition of affiliate
§ 322.7 - Definition of well-rated foreign banking corporation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 322

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 12, 202-b[1]-[2], 204

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
